title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Definition, importance and use of specification: principles and practices, drawing of specification clauses. General and special clauses. Specification of common building materials including carriage and stacking of materials. Specification of simple construction. Specifications of BIS and other Institutions. General abbreviations used in specifications. Specification of new building materials.
